inclusion.criterion: limited prognosis (several months to < 2 year survival)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALL in CR2 or CR3 and not eligible for allogeneic SCT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Follicular lymphoma, previously identified as CD19+: At least 2 prior combination chemotherapy regimens
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Less than 1 year between last chemotherapy and progression
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Disease responding or stable after most recent therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CLL: At least 2 prior chemotherapy regimens
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Less than 2 years between last chemotherapy and progression
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Not eligible or appropriate for conventional allogeneic SCT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mantle cell lymphoma: Beyond 1st CR with relapsed or persistent disease and not eligible or appropriate for conventional allogeneic or autologous SCT
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active hepatitis B or hepatitis C infection
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and presented with symptoms of cholecystitis. A pericardiocentesis was performed and the fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma.
